text: What’s your full name and affiliation? (e.g., 'Jane Doe — University of Calgary, UCVM')
What is your appointment type and time allocation? (e.g., research %, teaching %, clinical %, service %)
Briefly list your domain expertise, methods/skills, and any unique assets (e.g., genomics, large data, specialized clinics, datasets).
What research topics or proejcts are you most interested in pursuing in the next 1–3 years?
What constraints should we design around? (e.g., grant funding success, limited research time, lack of personnel, access to resources and labs)
Which populations, species, or systems can you access readily (e.g., patient types, farms, animal cohorts, cases, datasets, archives)?
Who are your likely collaborators or units (local or external)?
Are there any labs/facilities/resources you can leverage?
What funding programs might match your interests (internal, provincial, federal, foundations)?
What outcomes would define success in 12 months? (e.g., pilot data, 1–2 grants, papers, partnerships)
